attributes.additional_details:
The aim of the petition is to call for a revision on the specified guidelines for donating blood, not just for the homosexual community.

Currently, all those who have had any form of sexual contact with a gay or bisexual man, even with a condom, cannot donate blood for a year after this contact. This is not just about gay men. Women who have had sexual contact with bisexual men can also not donate blood, even if they have used a condom.

This petition calls for a revision of these regulations, as all groups specified above can donate organs, bone marrow, and get married.

rejection.details: Please see: Allow Gay Men to Donate Blood Freely
